scripts.local:setup: wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph create blue-coati/blue-coati --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.local:redeploy: graph codegen && wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/version http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph deploy blue-coati/blue-coati --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.mainnet:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN <thegraph-account>/blue-coati --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.rinkeby:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN wighawag/blue-coati-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.kovan:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN <thegraph-account>/blue-coati-kovan --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
